hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash cd genomic-etl-noncompliant-s3-bucket
terraform init terraform workspace select ${study_id}-${chrom_number} || terraform workspace new ${study_id}-${chrom_number} terraform apply -auto-approve -var "output_s3_bucket=${stack_s3_bucket}" -var "study_id=${study_id}" -var "chrom_number=${chrom_number}" & wait
cd ../genomic-etl-infrastructure-noncompliant
aws s3 cp s3://${output_s3_bucket}/genomic-etl/deployment_state_metadata/${study_id}/${chrom_number}/genomic_etl_variables.tf . aws s3 cp s3://${output_s3_bucket}/genomic-etl/deployment_state_metadata/subnet_variables.tf . aws s3 cp s3://${output_s3_bucket}/genomic-etl/deployment_state_metadata/${study_id}/${chrom_number}/terraform.tfstate .
cd ../genomic-etl-infrastructure-noncompliant export TF_LOG="INFO" terraform init terraform workspace select ${study_id}-${chrom_number}-ws || terraform workspace new ${study_id}-${chrom_number}-ws terraform apply -auto-approve -var="az=${az}" -var="s3_role=${arn_role_cnc}" -var="study_name=${study_name}" -var="ami-id=${ami_id}" -var="output_s3_bucket=${output_s3_bucket}" -var="study_id=${study_id}" -var="chrom_number=${chrom_number}" || true
aws s3 cp terraform.tfstate s3://${stack_s3_bucket}/genomic-etl/deployment_state_metadata/${study_id}/${chrom_number}/terraform.tfstate || echo 'tfstate for ec2 error'
aws ec2 describe-spot-fleet-requests --region us-east-1 --query "SpotFleetRequestConfigs[?SpotFleetRequestConfig.LaunchSpecifications[?TagSpecifications[?Tags[?Value == 'Genomic ETL Annotation Pipeline - ${study_id} Chromosome ${chrom_number}']]] && (SpotFleetRequestState == 'active' || SpotFleetRequestState=='open')].SpotFleetRequestId" > fleet_id_${study_id}_${chrom_number}.txt export fleetId=`grep sfr fleet_id_${study_id}_${chrom_number}.txt | cut -d '"' -f 2` && echo fleet id ${fleetId} aws ec2 describe-spot-fleet-instances --spot-fleet-request-id ${fleetId} --query "ActiveInstances[?InstanceHealth=='healthy'].InstanceId" --output text --region us-east-1 > instance_id_${study_id}_${chrom_number}.txt export instanceId=`grep 'i-' instance_id_${study_id}_${chrom_number}.txt | cut -d '"' -f 2` && echo ${instanceId} export restartCount=0 while [ -z ${instanceId} ] do echo 'waiting for instance launch' sleep 10 aws ec2 describe-spot-fleet-instances --spot-fleet-request-id ${fleetId} --query "ActiveInstances[?InstanceHealth=='healthy'].InstanceId" --output text --region us-east-1 > instance_id_${study_id}_${chrom_number}.txt export instanceId=`grep 'i-' instance_id_${study_id}_${chrom_number}.txt | cut -d '"' -f 2` done
echo first instance id ${instanceId} while [[ -z $(aws --region=us-east-1 ec2 describe-tags --filters Name=resource-id,Values="${instanceId}" Name=tag:AnnotationComplete,Values="true" | grep AnnotationComplete) ]] && [[ -z $(aws --region=us-east-1 ec2 describe-tags --filters Name=resource-id,Values="${instanceId}" Name=tag:AnnotationComplete,Values="false" | grep AnnotationComplete) ]] do #!/bin/bash aws ec2 describe-spot-fleet-instances --spot-fleet-request-id ${fleetId} --query "ActiveInstances[?InstanceHealth=='healthy'].InstanceId" --output text --region us-east-1 > instance_id_${study_id}_${chrom_number}.txt export newInstanceId=`grep 'i-' instance_id_${study_id}_${chrom_number}.txt | cut -d '"' -f 2` if [ -z ${newInstanceId} ] then echo "Instance id changed. Waiting for new instance id"; elif [ "${newInstanceId}" != "${instanceId}" ] then echo "Instance id changed. New instance id is " ${newInstanceId}; export instanceId=${newInstanceId}; else echo "Instance stable. Annotation in process"; fi
sleep 60
done
if [ $(aws --region=us-east-1 ec2 describe-tags --filters Name=resource-id,Values="${instanceId}" Name=key,Values=AnnotationComplete --query "Tags[*].Value" | jq .[0]) = '"true"' ] then echo 'Annotation completed successfully' export AnnotationDone=true else echo 'Annotation not successful' export AnnotationDone=false fi
if ($terminate_on_completion) then aws ec2 cancel-spot-fleet-requests --region us-east-1 --spot-fleet-request-ids ${fleetId} --terminate-instances || echo 'could not terminate' #TODO ADD VOLUME DELETE HERE fi
if [ ${AnnotationDone} = false ] then exit 44 fi
